title: Rescuing the Supporting Character - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Episodic   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage of Convenience   Possessive Characters   Sickly Characters   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   World Travel
author: 戈子
description:
The ending of fairy tales is usually a happy ending for the hero and heroine. As for the supporting characters, who will care about their happiness? They turn dark the next day after having such a bad thought. They want to revolt, and they don’t want to be the main couple’s stepping stone to their 'true love' again. Oh my god! What about the plot? What kind of story will play out with a character like this? Can it still run smoothly? The hero and heroine are going to be crippled by the supporting character!!!! Well, there’s actually a project to save the plot from it. By nipping the bud of all evil thoughts from them, they let the hero and heroine live together in happiness. The title of this project is 'To Save the Supporting Character.' All executors must dutifully do their work, and as for the means to achieve it, Oh, no! That’s not worth mentioning.
 
No matter whether it is a white cat or a black cat, if that cat can catch a mouse, then it is a good cat.>
